sub_title: Workplace Experience and Event Manager at Global Savings Group
summary: I am a versatile, confident and curious person who has worked at diverse positions across different countries. I bring to the table 8 years of living and working in China which has enriched my skills' portfolio and makes me stand out in all aspects of my professional and personal life. I thrive in an international and multicultural environment where I can be with and support people by creating a welcoming and collaborative environment, while contributing with my knowledge and skills towards the maximization of any industry and people's potential.
